32/* Intel GTT stubs */
33
34#include <sys/cdefs.h>
35__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: intel_gtt.c,v 1.11 2018/08/27 16:15:23 riastradh Exp $");
36
37#include <sys/types.h>
38#include <sys/bus.h>
39#include <sys/errno.h>
40#include <sys/systm.h>
41
42#include <machine/vmparam.h>
43
44#include <dev/pci/pcivar.h> /* XXX agpvar.h needs... */
45#include <dev/pci/agpvar.h>
46#include <dev/pci/agp_i810var.h>
47
48#include "drm/intel-gtt.h"
49
50/* Access to this should be single-threaded. */
51static struct {
52 bus_dma_segment_t scratch_seg;
53 bus_dmamap_t scratch_map;
54} intel_gtt;
55
56void
57intel_gtt_get(uint64_t *va_size, size_t *stolen_size, bus_addr_t *aper_base,
58 uint64_t *aper_size)
59{
60 struct agp_softc *const sc = agp_i810_sc;
61
62 if (sc == NULL) {
63 *va_size = 0;
64 *stolen_size = 0;
65 *aper_base = 0;
66 *aper_size = 0;
67 return;
68 }
69
70 struct agp_i810_softc *const isc = sc->as_chipc;
71 *va_size = ((size_t)(isc->gtt_size/sizeof(uint32_t)) << PAGE_SHIFT);
72 *stolen_size = ((size_t)isc->stolen << PAGE_SHIFT);
73 *aper_base = sc->as_apaddr;
74 *aper_size = sc->as_apsize;
75}
76
77int
78intel_gmch_probe(struct pci_dev *bridge_pci __unused,
79 struct pci_dev *gpu __unused, struct agp_bridge_data *bridge_agp __unused)
80{
81 struct agp_softc *const sc = agp_i810_sc;
82 int nsegs;
83 int error;
84
85 if (sc == NULL)
86 return 0;
87
88 error = bus_dmamem_alloc(sc->as_dmat, PAGE_SIZE, PAGE_SIZE, 0,
89 &intel_gtt.scratch_seg, 1, &nsegs, BUS_DMA_WAITOK);
90 if (error)
91 goto fail0;
92 KASSERT(nsegs == 1);
93
94 error = bus_dmamap_create(sc->as_dmat, PAGE_SIZE, 1, PAGE_SIZE, 0,
95 BUS_DMA_WAITOK, &intel_gtt.scratch_map);
96 if (error)
97 goto fail1;
98
99 error = bus_dmamap_load_raw(sc->as_dmat, intel_gtt.scratch_map,
100 &intel_gtt.scratch_seg, 1, PAGE_SIZE, BUS_DMA_WAITOK);
101 if (error)
102 goto fail2;
103
104 /* Success! */
105 return 1;
106
107fail3: __unused
108 bus_dmamap_unload(sc->as_dmat, intel_gtt.scratch_map);
109fail2: bus_dmamap_destroy(sc->as_dmat, intel_gtt.scratch_map);
110fail1: bus_dmamem_free(sc->as_dmat, &intel_gtt.scratch_seg, 1);
111fail0: KASSERT(error);
112 return 0;
113}
114
115void
116intel_gmch_remove(void)
117{
118 struct agp_softc *const sc = agp_i810_sc;
119
120 bus_dmamap_unload(sc->as_dmat, intel_gtt.scratch_map);
121 bus_dmamap_destroy(sc->as_dmat, intel_gtt.scratch_map);
122 bus_dmamem_free(sc->as_dmat, &intel_gtt.scratch_seg, 1);
123}
124
125bool
126intel_enable_gtt(void)
127{
128 struct agp_softc *sc = agp_i810_sc;
129 struct agp_i810_softc *isc;
130
131 if (sc == NULL)
132 return false;
133 isc = sc->as_chipc;
134 agp_i810_reset(isc);
135 return true;
136}
137
138void
139intel_gtt_chipset_flush(void)
140{
141
142 KASSERT(agp_i810_sc != NULL);
143 agp_i810_chipset_flush(agp_i810_sc->as_chipc);
144}
145
146void
147intel_gtt_insert_sg_entries(bus_dmamap_t dmamap, unsigned va_page,
148 unsigned flags)
149{
150 struct agp_i810_softc *const isc = agp_i810_sc->as_chipc;
151 off_t va = (va_page << PAGE_SHIFT);
152 unsigned seg;
153 int gtt_flags = 0;
154 int error;
155
156 KASSERT(0 <= va);
157 KASSERT((va >> PAGE_SHIFT) == va_page);
158 KASSERT(0 < dmamap->dm_nsegs);
159
160 gtt_flags |= AGP_I810_GTT_VALID;
161 switch (flags) {
162 case AGP_USER_MEMORY:
163 break;
164 case AGP_USER_CACHED_MEMORY:
165 gtt_flags |= AGP_I810_GTT_CACHED;
166 break;
167 default:
168 panic("invalid intel gtt flags: %x", flags);
169 }
170
171 for (seg = 0; seg < dmamap->dm_nsegs; seg++) {
172 const bus_addr_t addr = dmamap->dm_segs[seg].ds_addr;
173 bus_size_t len;
174
175 for (len = dmamap->dm_segs[seg].ds_len;
176 len >= PAGE_SIZE;
177 len -= PAGE_SIZE, va += PAGE_SIZE) {
178 /* XXX Respect flags. */
179 error = agp_i810_write_gtt_entry(isc, va, addr,
180 gtt_flags);
181 if (error)
182 device_printf(agp_i810_sc->as_dev,
183 "write gtt entry"
184 " %"PRIxMAX" -> %"PRIxMAX" failed: %d\n",
185 (uintmax_t)va, (uintmax_t)(addr | 1),
186 error);
187 }
188 KASSERTMSG(len == 0,
189 "segment length not divisible by PAGE_SIZE: %jx",
190 (uintmax_t)dmamap->dm_segs[seg].ds_len);
191 }
192 agp_i810_post_gtt_entry(isc, (va - PAGE_SIZE));
193 intel_gtt_chipset_flush();
194}
195
196void
197intel_gtt_clear_range(unsigned va_page, unsigned npages)
198{
199 struct agp_i810_softc *const isc = agp_i810_sc->as_chipc;
200 const bus_addr_t addr = intel_gtt.scratch_map->dm_segs[0].ds_addr;
201 const int gtt_flags = AGP_I810_GTT_VALID;
202 off_t va = (va_page << PAGE_SHIFT);
203
204 KASSERT(0 <= va);
205 KASSERT((va >> PAGE_SHIFT) == va_page);
206 KASSERT(0 < npages);
207
208 while (npages--) {
209 agp_i810_write_gtt_entry(isc, va, addr, gtt_flags);
210 va += PAGE_SIZE;
211 }
212 agp_i810_post_gtt_entry(isc, va - PAGE_SIZE);
213}
